channel.category: Nithyananda Vedic Science University and Temple
channel.title: Thus Spake Nithyananda!

item.title: Patanjali Yoga Sutras: Removing Wrong Knowledge leads to Individual Transformation & Global Peace
item.description: From the works of living enlightened master Paramahamsa Nithyananda, this clip is taken from Patanjali Yoga Sutras discourse delivered by Him in 2008. In this video clip, He describes how our past conditionings affect our reasoning and lead us to wrong knowledge. This consequently leads to all suffering and depression in one's life. He talks about judgements and opinions that are framed based on such wrong knowledge. Complete understanding of this sutra is a meditation in itself and can result in individual transformation and global peace. He gives a simple technique to understand our past conditionings that affect our present moment.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Staying Inspired
item.description: In this clip taken from discourse titled, "You Are That", Swamiji answers a question about containing inspiration drawn from watching Swamiji's discourses. He tells us that there is no need for containing the inspiration, but let the inspiration go deep inside us. He tells us that we should hold the inspiration in one hand and the responsibilities we have taken on the other hand, and in the course of time, automatically one of them will drop! He goes on to describe a beautiful verse from Shankara on getting inspired and staying inspired. Swamiji also tells us that the work towards enlightenment is never wasted.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: What is Initiation?
item.description:
This clip is taken from the discourse titled, "Unclutching -- De-program the inner self" delivered during the third day of the first Nithya Dhyan mass satsang held in Bangalore in December 2007.

We find that we get drained easily of life energy either from the environment outside or from within due to our own inner conditionings. Whenever you need to heal yourself or bring yourself again to the life energy, the truths or ideas that brings you out of the tiredness or low energy or depression, those truths are called Shastra Shastras or knowledge weapons. The truths that not only brings us out of the depression, but also destroys the source of depression once for all is called mantra. Truth that comes out of enlightened inner space, and causes a click that is beyond logic, a sort of quantum connection with the very core of us is called initiation. The initiation can break the very core of depression, the very core of the mind.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Vitarka
item.description:
It's very easy to apply logic and reasoning for something. But question remains - are we going anywhere with that reasoning? What is reasoning (Tarka), What is Wrong reasoning (Kutarka) and what is Right reasoning(Vitarka) is what Swamiji explains in this video.

This is the discourse delivered at the Inner Awakening program in June 2009. Swamiji is very beautifully explaining the power of Vitarka!

~In Nithyananda~
Blissful Volunteer
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Establishing in the Non-Return Zone of Living Enlightenment
item.description:
In this discourse Swamiji lays out the rationale for 21 days meditation program.
"Inner Awakening" in terms of three stages. ...Struggling, Practicing, Experiencing...

Master is Graceful and very compassionate and He makes sure that person attending the program does not miss the real experience!

~ In Nithyananda ~
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Yogam Tour 2009 Second phase
item.description:
Swamiji is visiting North America and Canada right now. Make use of an opportunity and check Yogam Calendar!

Kalpataru Program Module 1 has playlist of about 14 videos.

Kalpataru Program Module 2 has playlist of about 12 videos

~ In Nithyananda ~
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Practicing Living Enlightenment
item.description:
Extra ordinary video with strong words and very beautiful understanding. "Enlightenment" is explained so nicely that all misconceptions will be cleared.

In Nithyananda ~
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Love The Ultimate Bridge to Enlightenment
item.description:
When there is Love with the subject, when there is Love felt because of an experience and not a object then that Love can bridge the gap between you and Enlightenment. Very Lovely video!

~Nithyananda~
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Life Bliss Engineering
item.description:
Transform yourself and experience that Life is Bliss. Check this video out which describes the content of Life Bliss Engineering Program (LBE).

~Nithyanandam
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Yoga Sutras: Danger of Practicing Techniques without Understanding
item.description:
Misconcept that we carry that doing rituals is all. But how often we don't realize that without understanding what we are doing, we can not essentially reach anywhere. Swamiji talks on Yoga Sutras and explains this.

~ Nithyanandam ~
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Mind is an Action
item.description:
In this short video, Swamiji is addressing the working of Mind while delivering Patanjali Yoga Sutras. Watch the video to know how simple and sweet truth it is ~

In Nithyananda !
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Accept others can be transformed & be transformed
item.description:
It is the video where Swami ji is explaining one of the Shiva Sutra. Opening ourselves to the possibility that transformation of others is possible and in turn allowing our inner space to believe in our transformation too.

~Nithyanandam~
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Science of Enlightenment
item.description:
Very nice question and answer. Very interesting answer and explanation from a Living Enlightened Master. Watch this video and clear your doubts.

~Nithyanandam~
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Discipline that arises out of your understanding is transformational
item.description:
Indeed the discipline that becomes part of us -> leads to the real Master-Disciple relationship. Watch this video where Swamiji is explaining unless the discipline or routine becomes part of us, we can not reach the transformational state.

In Nithyananda~
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Technique for Sudden Enlightenment by being Uninterruptedly Aware
item.description:
Watch this video where Swamiji is describing the technique given by Mahadeva - Shiva. This talks about the experience or the glimpse of the silence and glimpse of the enlightenment. It is very practical technique that we can try in our daily life.

~Nithyanandam
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Relax into your Being and be guided
item.description:
This is one of those videos which reminds to drop the ego and live the very being. Taken from Bhagavad Gita Chapter 3, Swamiji explains how life is purposeless.

~Nithyanandam~
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Experience the Cosmic Space - Technique & Meditation
item.description:
Enter the Cosmic space with the friendliness to everyone around you. Superb meditation technique. Try it for eleven days and feel the experience.

~Nithyanandam
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Enter the Space that can never Die Technique & Meditation
item.description: In this discourse, Swamiji has given the understanding about the space that we have that never dies. Deeper meaning and so nicely explained. With the powerful meditation techniques we can get rid of the fears which are stopping us from believing in the space which is always alive.
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Gita Ch 2: Q&A on Relevance of Gita and Miracles
item.description: Someone like us asked a question and here is the answer. We wonder how Gita is relevant to today's world and today's lifestyle; but it is the only relevant one. And we believe it or not; miracles do happen!
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Give Awareness & Heal yourself
item.description:
Anything that hurts or feels heavy, what is required is just to give awareness and attention to that part - it heals! Listen to this video for more.
~Nithyanandam~
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Self Remembrance
item.description: Simple way to remind your self about your own being and then see the difference in our day to day dialogues and issues..
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Jayanti Message 2009 - Live Enlightenment
item.description:
What a message from Swamiji. A changing moment -- when we internalize this message!
~ Nithyanandam ~
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Spontaneity
item.description: With fun and stories, let's see what spontaneity is! Let's see how we can live with spontaneity!
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Samskaras and the Seven Layers -- Deep Truths
item.description: Beautiful video where Swamiji is explaining the Samskaras and different layers of body. You can get a small summary of NSP (Nithyananda Spurana Program)
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)

item.title: Meditation has deeper impact on busy people
item.description:
Small but a very strong message to understand impact of Meditation at a Deeper level. We claim to be busy and spend lot of energy but with the help of meditation we can convert and direct that energy to the right direction.




In Nithyananda....
item.author: noreply@blogger.com (Unknown)
